posts.post_content:
Hello collectors,

I would like to purchase a signed T206 if anyone has one for sale. I'm not picky on the player or the condition of the card aside from the signature. I'm always prepared to pay a reasonable price.

Please do send me an e-mail is you have one for sale.

e-mail: [url]rare_baseballstuff@yahoo.com[/url]

Thank you.
